articles.author: Nikki Carvajal and Kate Sullivan, CNN
articles.title: Biden says the 'right to choose is fundamental,' but 'not prepared' to call for change to filibuster to protect abortion rights - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday urged Congress to pass legislation codifying Roe v. Wade and said a woman's right to have an abortion is "fundamental," but added that he wasn't ready to call for an end to the filibuster to push for abortion rights legislation.

articles.title: Cognitive loss from severe Covid equivalent to 20 years of ageing, reveals study - India TV News
articles.description: Cognitive impairment is common to a wide range of neurological disorders, including dementia, and even routine ageing, but the patterns we saw - the cognitive 'fingerprint' of Covid-19 - was distinct from all of these,' said researchers.
